text: Kyle Baillie (born April 7, 1991)”Kyle Baillie ESPN Profile” Accessed:2/9/19 is a Canadian rugby union player. He plays as a flanker or lock for the Canadian national team and New Orleans Gold in Major League Rugby.“New Orleans Gold Rugby Signs Kyle Baillie” 15/10/18 Baillie previously played for the Ohio Aviators in PRO Rugby and London Scottish in the Green King IPA Championship and had a trial at Saracens on loan from London Scottish. “Kyle Baillie It’s Rugby Profile” Accessed:2/9/19 ==References== Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Canada international rugby union players Category:Canadian rugby union players Category:Sportspeople from St. Albert, Alberta Category:Rugby union flankers Category:Rugby union locks Category:Prairie Wolf Pack players
title: Kyle Baillie
